data.prayer: Father, help the 288 believers in Erzurum to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 766,412 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Erzurum, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Erzurum, Turkey by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Erzurum, Turkey, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Erzurum.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Kurd, Kurmanji people. Make the Kurd, Kurmanji people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, help your children in Erzurum, Turkey find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Erzurum, Turkey need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the state of Erzurum, Turkey has a population of 766,700.

We estimate Erzurum has 288 people who might know Jesus, 4,292 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 762,120 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,662 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Erzurum.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
